name: ALONE (itch) (Noodles)
description:
Alone is a small first-person horror game that follow the story of young man who found a really nice apartment for a cheap price without knowing the history behind the place. Right after moving in, horrific events start taking place in the apartment that makes him regret ever stepping a foot into this place. 

Controls:

W A S D ---> Movement

Right Click  --> Pick up/Use 

Left Click --->  Interact 

Space ---> Jump

Ctrl ---> Crouch

Shift ---> Run

Tab ---> Inventory
